title: EpiHiper run parameters
description: A schema describing the run parameters for EpiHiper

modelScenario.description: Filename of the disease model in a json file.

startTick.description: The start tick for the simulation run

endTick.description: The start tick for the simulation run

output.description: Path + name of the output file

summaryOutput.description: Path + name of the summary output file

status.description: Path + name of the output SciDuct status file

seed.description: The seed for the random number generator

replicate.description: The number of the replicate created with the job

dbName.description: The name of the data base

dbHost.description: The host of the database (including optional port)

dbPassword.description: The password of the DB user

dbMaxRecords.description: The maximal number of records returned by a single query (0: unlimited)
